game.story: You can even substitute second-stringers for the skill positions (QB, RB, WR, TE, and FS/SS) when your starters get tired. Games are divided into four 15-minute (accelerated real-time) quarters.

game.name: New Ghostbusters II (Europe)
game.story: New Ghostbusters II follows loosely the original Ivan Reitman's film plot. You start out by selecting two ghostbusters out of five (The 5th one is Louis Tully).

game.name: New Zealand Story, The (Europe)
game.story: One day, a kiwi tribe was having fun and games outside the zoo, only to be kidnapped by the evil-minded Leopard Seal, who plans to sell them at the black market.

game.name: NFL (USA)
game.story: Based on professional football as played in the National Football League, NFL was the first 8-bit console game to carry the official NFL license. The camera also zooms in for closeups on receiving plays.

game.name: Nigel Mansell's World Championship Challenge (USA)
game.story: Timing smiled on Gremlin with this licensed Formula 1 simulation, as Nigel's long quest for a championship had finally come good.

game.name: Nightmare on Elm Street, A (USA)
game.story: Nightmare has two worlds.

game.name: Nightshade (USA)
game.story: Sutekh has gotten rid of local superhero Vortex, and now Metro City is in the hands of crime. You are Nightshade - the superhero that nobody knows - and your goal is to stop the evil doers, including main villain Sutekh.

game.name: Ninja Crusaders (USA)
game.story: In Ninja Crusaders, a force of alien invaders has descended upon the earth and has wiped out humanity for the most part.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden (USA)
game.story: It is revealed that the doomed ninja is the father of Ryu Hayabusa. When Ryu learns of this, he embarks on a quest to find out who killed his father and why.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chaos (USA)
game.description: Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chaos

game.name: Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of Doom (USA)
game.description: Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of Doom
game.story: Some time has passed since the defeat of Ashtar and the resurrected Jaquio, and Irene Lew has received a new mission to complete.

game.name: Ninja Kid (USA)
game.story: Enemies obstructing Ninja Kid's quest include rolling eyeballs, crows, flying demons, Frankenstein monsters, and of course, other ninjas.

game.name: Nintendo World Championships 1990 (USA)
game.story: This is the cartridge that was used for the Nintendo World Championships held in 1990 in 30 cities across the U.S.

game.name: Nintendo World Cup (USA)

game.name: Noah's Ark (Europe)

game.story: Nobunaga's Ambition II is the sequel to Nobunaga's Ambition. The setting is 16th century feudal Japan, a period when ruthless daimyo (feudal lords) contended with each other for dominance.

game.name: North and South (USA)

game.name: Orb 3D (USA)

game.name: Othello (USA)

game.name: Over Horizon (Europe)
game.story: Over Horizon is a side-scrolling shooter in which the player has to guide a spaceship through various levels and destroy numerous enemies.

game.name: Overlord (USA)

game.name: Pac-Man (USA) (Namco)
game.story: This only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghost's eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Pac-Man again.

game.story: This only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghosts' eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Pac-Man again.

game.name: Pin-Bot (USA)

game.name: Pipe Dream (USA)

game.story: As Popeye, you are trying to win Olive Oyl's love!

game.name: Power Blade (USA)

game.name: Puzzle (USA) (Unl)

game.name: Quattro Adventure (USA) (Unl)

game.name: R.B.I. Baseball 2 (USA) (Unl)
game.story: This time around the game uses the teams and statistics from the 1989 season.

game.name: R.B.I. Baseball 3 (USA) (Unl)
game.story: R.B.I.

game.name: R.C. Pro-Am (USA) (Rev A)
game.story: Guide your radio controlled car to victory in this racing game.

game.name: R.C. Pro-Am II (USA)
game.story: This second Pro-Am racing game for NES introduces some innovations compared to its predecessor.

game.name: Race America (USA)
game.story: Race America is a 2-car cross-country racing game. The game provides eight colorful opponents to race against, each of whom is supposed to have distinct advantages in a race.

game.name: Racket Attack (USA)
game.story: Then it's time to serve it up.

game.name: Rackets & Rivals (Europe)
game.story: Here the match parameters can be set beforehand, e.g.

game.name: Rad Racer (USA)
game.story: The object of the game is to race to the goal within the given time limit.

game.story: Rad Racer II is an arcade style racing game which is the sequel to Rad Racer and features similar gameplay. Also new is a turbo boost which allows you to reach speeds of 255 mph.

game.story: There are three different types of tennis courts to play on; grass, clay, and hard.

game.name: RoboCop 2 (USA) (Rev A)

game.name: Rock 'n' Ball (USA)
game.story: Next is battle flipper.

game.name: Rod Land (Europe)

game.name: Rollerball (USA)
game.story: There are two different game variations included. The second is called Matchplay.

game.name: Rollerblade Racer (USA)
game.story: If you crash too many times during an event or run out of time, the game will be over.

game.name: Rollergames (USA)
game.story: It includes a silly story about three different roller skates gangs (somewhat like motor cycle gangs) in a close future, which is most an excuse for the game to exist.

game.name: Rolling Thunder (USA) (Unl)
game.story: Your mission is to stop an underground conspiracy to conquer the world and to save agent Leila, who has been captured.

game.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms (USA)

game.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA)
game.description: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
game.story: The sequel to Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

game.name: Rush'n Attack (USA)

game.story: You thought the men approaching you were your rescue but they were the enemy. When you encounter an enemy, your only attack is a kick so plan your strategy accordingly.

game.name: Section-Z (USA)
game.story: Under the command of the Master Control, named L-Brain, the Invaders defeat Earth's space forces.

game.name: Seicross (USA)

game.story: Big Bird says the name of a letter, which you must then find. There are groups of four letters again, however Big Bird does not instruct you what to spell this time.

game.name: Sesame Street 123 (USA)
game.story: This math-based learning title for Ages 3 to 6 featuring Sesame Street characters.

game.name: Sesame Street ABC (USA)
game.story: Ernie's Big Splash: Children can help Ernie find his rubber duckie for his bath by building a pathway from duckie's soap dish to Ernie's bathtub.

game.name: Sesame Street ABC & 123 (USA)
game.story: Sesame Street 1 2 3/A B C is a compilation of the following Sesame Street NES games: 1. Sesame Street 1 2 3 2.

game.name: Sesame Street Countdown (USA)
game.story: The only way to lose in the game is to touch the incorrect numbers (numbers other than the one you are required to find) which will drain your life bar.

game.name: Shadow of the Ninja (USA)
game.story: In the 21st century, the evil Emperor Garuda has taken over the city of New York, killing many of its inhabitants. You play as either Hayate or Kaede, two ninjas who are attempting to free the city from Garuda's control.

game.name: Shadowgate (USA)

game.name: Shatterhand (USA)

game.name: Shingen the Ruler (USA)

game.name: Shinobi (USA) (Unl)

game.name: Shockwave (USA) (Unl)

game.story: This cartridge used the power pad and contained two games: Short Order, is a Simon-like game in which you are given an order and need to make the burger exactly as the order says.

game.story: To be victorious you will need to battle both military forces and alien creatures in a variety of different landscapes. There are eight different worlds with numerous, deadly enemies to conquer.

game.name: Silent Service (USA) (Rev A)
game.story: You are now a member of the Silent Service, the US Navy Submarine command. For a long while after Pearl Harbor, you are the only forces capable of striking back at the Japanese in the Pacific.

game.name: Silk Worm (USA)
game.story: Silkworm is a classic horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up based on the 1988 Tecmo arcade game.

game.story: The Silver Surfer roams throughout space as herald to Galactus, looking for new planets for him to feed on. However his mission is interrupted by a summon from Galactus.

game.name: Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the Space Mutants (USA) (Rev A)
game.description: Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the Space Mutants
game.story: Bart vs. This won't be easy since the Space Mutants are using human bodies as disguise.

game.name: Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the World (USA)
game.description: Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the World
game.story: This game is actually a compilation of smaller games belonging to different genres. Needless to say all games are connected to the famous TV series The Simpsons.

game.name: Simpsons, The - Bartman Meets Radioactive Man (USA)
game.description: Simpsons, The - Bartman Meets Radioactive Man
game.story: Bart Simpson is reading the latest comic about the Radioactive Man but his favourite superhero is not featured in it.

game.name: Skate or Die (USA)
game.story: You can use attacking moves to either remove hazards or knock your opponent over.

game.name: Skate or Die 2 - The Search for Double Trouble (USA)
game.description: Skate or Die 2 - The Search for Double Trouble
game.story: You play as the hero in this game.

game.name: Skull & Crossbones (USA) (Unl)
game.story: You gain money by vanquishing foes and digging for treasure where X marks the spot.

game.name: Sky Kid (USA)
game.story: If you fail to land on the landing strip, you run out of fuel and crash.

game.name: Sky Shark (USA) (Rev 0A)

game.name: Slalom (USA)
game.story: In Slalom you need to ski down different trails and beat the clock to move on to the next of the 24 trails.

game.name: Smash T.V. (USA)

game.name: Smurfs, The (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es)

game.name: Snake Rattle n Roll (USA)
game.story: Foes include Jaws, a monster that's all teeth and will kill you if you stay in the water too long, and Bigfoots, which stomp all over the place and require multiple tongue lashings to defeat.

game.name: Snake's Revenge (USA)
game.story: There is a greater variety of areas such as a jungle, a warehouse, a train, a couple of prisons and even a cargo ship containing the mass-produced Metal Gears.

game.name: Snoopy's Silly Sports Spectacular! (USA)

game.name: Solitaire (USA) (Unl)

game.name: Solomon's Key 2 (Europe)

game.name: Solstice - The Quest for the Staff of Demnos (USA)

game.name: Space Shuttle Project (USA)

game.name: Spelunker (USA)

game.story: After each wall in the building has been destroyed, you move on to the next (and more difficult) building.

game.name: Wurm - Journey to the Center of the Earth! (USA)
game.description: Wurm - Journey to the Center of the Earth!
game.story: In the year 1999, the world is suddenly facing intensive natural disasters. Scientists are perplexed and decide that research on the inside of the earth is needed.

game.name: WWF King of the Ring (USA)
game.story: WWF King of the Ring Another wrestling clone released back in the days with a little differences such as skill ratings which gives it a little bit of a strategic feel.

game.name: WWF Wrestlemania (USA)
game.story: This game puts you in the boots of the biggest stars of the time such as Andre The Giant, Hulk Hogan, and Randy Savage.

game.name: WWF Wrestlemania Challenge (USA)
game.story: You can go through a small career trying to become the WWF Wrestling Champion by playing as you. There are also one on one playdowns.

game.name: WWF Wrestlemania Steel Cage Challenge (USA)
game.story: The game features several famous WWF stars, such as Macho Man Randy Savage, Bret Hitman Hart, The Mountie, The Undertaker, Irwin R.

game.name: Xenophobe (USA)
game.story: A distress call is received from space stations orbiting your homeworld, then silence. A single ship escapes, piloted by a battered man who tells the tale of pods that hatch into acid-spitting Xenos.

game.name: Xevious - The Avenger (USA)
game.story: It is discovered that the actual aliens on earth are human beings, and the ruthless Xevions want their planet back; but without us.

game.name: Xexyz (USA)
game.story: Due to nuclear wars and natural disasters, Earth's population has decreased dramatically and only five island are left, forming the nation of Xexyz.

game.name: Yo! Noid (USA)
game.story: The Noid, the mascot from Domino's Pizza commercials during the 1980s, is in trouble.

game.name: Yoshi (USA)
game.story: Switch and shuffle them to save the day. Or capture a whole bunch between two eggshell halves.

game.name: Yoshi's Cookie (USA)
game.story: To play, you move the randomly placed cookies into rows and columns of cookies with similar patterns.

game.name: Young Indiana Jones Chronicles, The (USA)
game.story: The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles is based on the television series of the same name, which is in turn based on the Lucas/Spielberg movie franchise starring Harrison Ford.

game.name: Zanac (USA)
game.story: The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles is based on the television series of the same name, which is in turn based on the Lucas/Spielberg movie franchise starring Harrison Ford.

game.name: Zen - Intergalactic Ninja (USA)
game.story: He has been assigned by a group a green, pointy-headed aliens to come to earth and stop environmental pollution by any means necessary. Eventually, he will have to find the big polluter, Lord Contaminous.

game.name: Zombie Nation (USA)
game.story: In 1999 a mysterious object crashes into the desert and a mysterious creature, Darc Seed appears.
